content: 47:24 There’s a couple of things that are driving the differential, one is I think Bill mentioned that we are now going to institute for some employees a quarterly bonus, so instead of having an annual bonus for this year in the first quarter of ’23, we’re going to make some payments this year, so that's affecting cash flow, succeed $80 million and then there were about $20 million or $25 million of deal costs related to Blue Prism acquisition and financing that are hitting the cash flow.
